column1: Why choose iNeuron For Data Science Master Program?
column2: iNeuron is not only a training institute but also comprises of a team of senior data scientists who have multiple years of experience in data science  deep learning  and machine learning and iNeuron is also into product development   Thus we have the capabilities to provide hands  on training to our candidates via in  house project contribution

column1: After completing the course will I get job opportunities?
column2: Of course we at iNeuron train the candidates according to the industry needs and specification   We also provide minimum of 3 job referrals along with resume building support as well as training on in  house projects and mock interviews

column1: Will I be assisted for Interview Preparation?
column2: After successful completion of the course the candidate will be given multiple rounds of mock interview preparation as well as a minimum of 3 job referrals

column1: Will there be placement opportunities at the end of the course completion?
column2: There will be placement opportunities after completion of the course. We will also be providing a minimum of 3 job referrals.
We'll provide referral to the candidates. We have our own custom portal where you can search for jobs.The link is:  https://jobs.ineuron.ai
